Title: Yakity Yak
Description:
Yaungols! They come through here taking what they want and destroying whatever's left.

I can't have these thugs destroy the last pieces of the Yak Wash here. It's all my boy and I have left.

Head over to our old ranch and dish out some pain on them yaungols. I bet if you kill enough of them they'll think twice before attacking anything in this area.
ObjectivesText: Kill 9 Burilgi Despoilers at the Muskpaw Ranch.
